controller

Class ScoreHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.utilities.ESource<ScoreData>
      • controller.ScoreHandler

  • public final class ScoreHandler
extends ESource<ScoreData>
    This class keeps in memory all of the players data and of respective scores and their timing.

    • Method Summary

      • getHandler

        public static ScoreHandler getHandler()
        This method returns the ScoreHandler. If the ScoreHandler is null it creates a new one on the first call.
        Returns:
        the ScoreHandler.
